Location:
- Bathroom ceiling exhaust vent/grille.

Observations:
- Flush-mounted rectangular vent with metal louvers.
- Surrounding drywall shows minimal patching/sealant; no visible staining or mold.
- Ceiling appears clean with no obvious cracks or sagging.
- Partial view of a metal fixture at the lower edge with some surface staining/rust.

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- No action required. If desired, verify the exhaust fan operates properly and seals around the vent are intact during routine maintenance.
